attributes.action: Make self defence part of the physical education programme
attributes.additional_details: In 2017, there were just under 39,600 recorded offences involving the use of a knife or sharp instrument in England and Wales. That’s the highest level recorded over a year since comparable figures began in 2011.
attributes.background: More and more assaults and the increase of knife crime I think schools should make it mandatory the schools should teach there students self defence
